16060.「では 今回の魔物狩りは\n このメンバーで 行うこととしよう。:
So, let's take this time to hunt for monsters
with this group.

16061.「グロスナー王 直々の お召しにより\n ガートラントの華 このスピンドルも\n:
King Grossner, by his personal invitation, the
flower of Gartlant, Spindle, will also
make an emergency entry!

16062.「自分は いつ いかなるときも\n グロスナー王のそばにあって\n 護衛の任を:
I will always be at King Grossner's side, and
I will always be his bodyguard.

16063.「私 荒っぽいのは 苦手だと言ってるのに\n 無理矢理 参加させられてしまいまし:
I said I'm not good at rough stuff, but they
forced me to join...

16064.「ボヤくな ボヤくな。\n 城に 閉じこもってばかりいないで\n たまには 身体:
Don't blabber, don't blabber. Don't stay
cooped up in the castle. It's good to move
around once in a while.

16065.「さて 今回の獲物だが……\n このザマ峠の 博愛の碑辺りに 出現する\n <%:
Now, as for the prize this time, I'm thinking
of Drag Racers, which appears around the
Love Statues in this Zama Pass.

16066.「だが 普通に倒すだけでは つまらんからな。\n ひとつ 競争することにしようか:
But it's boring to just beat them. Let's have
a competition. I'll give a reward to the
winner.

16067.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が よく落とす\n 地竜のツノ。これを いちば:
Earth Dragon Horns are often dropped by
Drag Racers. The first one to bring it to
me will be the winner!

16068.「それなら 審判は 私が 引き受けましょう。\n 地竜のツノを 手に入れた方は:
In that case, I will take over the judging.
If you received the Earth Dragon Horn, please
bring it to me.

16069.「では 今から 狩りの開始じゃ！\n 皆 ケガなどせぬよう 気をつけて\n ハン:
Well, the hunt begins now! Take care and hunt
carefully, so you don't get hurt!

16074.「……貴様ら。わしを ガートラント国王\n グロスナーと知っての ろうぜきかっ！:
You... you... you know me as King Grossner of
Gatland! Do you know me as King Grossner of
Gartlant?

16075.「もちろん よーく ご存知さ。\n オーガという種族全体を 堕落させる\n 罪深:
Of course, you're well aware of that. King
Grossner of the sinful Gartlant royal family,
who corrupts the entire Ogre species.

16076.「我らは ガズバランの牙！\n オーガの未来を憂う 秘密結社よ。:
We are Gazbalan's Fang! We are a secret
society that fears for the future of Ogre.

16078.「その生涯を ひたすら修行に費やす\n オーガ本来の生き方を 取り戻すため\n:
I ask His Majesty the Jamaraja to leave so that he can return to his original way of life, which is to spend his entire life in
asceticism.

16081.<center>あの後ろにいる 旅人。\nヤツには お前たちでは勝てぬ。\n今は:
That traveler back there. You cannot defeat
him. Now retreat...

16083.グロスナー王を救った <pc>たちは\nケガを負った 兵士リッグを運んで\nザマ:
After saving King Grossner, <pc> and
his men carried the wounded soldier Rigg back
to Zama Beacon.

16084.参謀マグナスや スピンドル兵士長も合流し\n魔物狩りは 終了となった。:
The hunt for monsters was over when Magnus,
the chief of staff, and Captain Spindle
joined.

16085.「ガズバランの牙……\n そのような 危険な秘密結社が\n ガートラント王家を狙:
Gazbalan's Fang...such a dangerous secret
society had never been imagined to be
targeting the royal family of Gartlant...

16086.「その場にいれば このスピンドルが\n けちらしてやりましたものを……\n 無念:
If I had been there, I would have
kicked them out...
What a pity.

16087.「ともかく 大事なくて よかった。\n リッグのケガも たいしたことがなくて\n:
Anyway, I'm glad it was nothing serious.
Rigg's injury wasn't too serious either, so
that's a relief.

16088.「ところで 魔物狩り競争は どうなった？\n わしは ウヤムヤにするつもりは な:
By the way, what happened to the monster-
hunting contest? I don't intend to leave it
unanswered.

16089.「それでしたら １位は グロスナー王。\n ２位は <pc>さんです。\n 他の:
If that's the case, then 1st place goes to King Grossner; 2nd place goes to . The others don't have Earth
Dragon Horn.

16090.「……フム。そうか わしの優勝か！\n しかし わしが 賞品をもらっても 仕方な:
...Hm. I see... I'm the winner! But it's no
use for me to accept the prize. I will only
accept the honor of winning.

16091.「というわけで 優勝賞品は ２位である\n <pc>に 贈るとしよう。\n さあ:
So, the first place prize goes to the second
place winner, <pc>. Well, you're
welcome to it.

16092.「今回の魔物狩りは これで終了とする。\n 思いがけぬトラブルも 起こったが\n:
This concludes our hunt for monsters. I had
some unexpected trouble, but it's been a while
since I've been here, and I had a lot of fun.

16093.「では わしらは 城に戻るとしよう！\n <pc> ジャンガ ご苦労であった。:
Now we shall return to the castle!
<pc> Janga, thank you very much.
